==Trivia==
*{{Lang|{{w|Mikhail Baranov}}|ru=Михаил Баранов|ru_rm={{#invoke:ru-rm|main|Михаил Баранов}}}}, was a Soviet fighter pilot, who during the early stages of the {{W|Battle of Stalingrad}} became the leading Soviet ace of 1942 with around 23 solo aerial victories.
